job_description:
React Developer 
Hybrid - Dallas, TX 
Long Term Contract 

Any Visa is fine. 

please share resume to Aravind.k@expertspro.io
ai_prompt:
Write a good email to recuriter for the job description provided. Make sure to add new lines in between each para, not limited to 1 line but 3-4 lines after each para.

Please provide:
1. A concise, professional subject line
2. A personalized email body that:
   - Expresses genuine interest in the position
   - Highlights relevant skills and experience from the resume that match the job description
   - Demonstrates knowledge of the role
   - Includes a clear call to action
   - Maintains a professional yet personable tone
3. Body should start with for which position I am reaching out for. then what are my skills from jd that I have in bullet points style. lastly find my attached resume like closing statement.
4. If the jd mentioned recuriter name, start with Hello [recruiter name], else start with just Hello,
Do not send subject line in body.

Format your response as JSON with two fields: "subject" and "body".

Subject should be
Application for [role name] (Location).

Signature at end of email should be.
Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434


Example response:


I hope you’re doing well.

Thank you for sharing the details of the Senior Java Microservices Engineer (Cloud-Native | Reactive Systems) position in Sunnyvale, CA. I’m very interested in this opportunity and believe my experience aligns closely with the role requirements.

I have over 10 years of experience in designing and developing scalable, cloud-native, and microservices-based enterprise applications using Java (8–17), Spring Boot, and distributed systems architecture. My technical background also includes hands-on expertise with Kubernetes, Docker, GCP, Azure, and messaging frameworks such as Kafka.

Some highlights from my experience include:

- Designing reactive, fault-tolerant microservices using Spring Boot, WebFlux, and Camel.

- Deploying and scaling microservices on Kubernetes and cloud platforms (Azure & GCP).

- Working with Oracle, Cassandra, and Cosmos DB for distributed data processing.

- Implementing CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Git, ensuring high code quality through JUnit, Mockito, and TDD practices.

- Strong focus on performance tuning, multithreading, and high availability in distributed systems.


Please find my updated resume attached for your review. I would love the opportunity to discuss how my experience aligns with your client’s needs.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

{Signature}
email_body:
Hello Aravind,

I am reaching out regarding the React Developer position in Dallas, TX. I am excited about this opportunity and believe my skills and experience closely match the job description:

- Proficient in React development for building interactive and responsive web applications.
- Experience with hybrid development and long-term contract engagements.

Attached, you will find my resume for your review. I look forward to the possibility of discussing how my background aligns with the requirements of the role.

Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434

job_description:
#hiring
Hello Professionals,
We are looking for Java Lead for one of our client at Atlanta, GA

Job Title: Java Lead with GCP
Location: Atlanta, GA - Hybrid
Job type: Contract (C2C/W2)
**Experience: 12+ yrs**

Skills required- 
• Spring Boot, Spring XD and Hibernate 
• Two plus years of experience in designing and deploying enterprise solutions in Google Cloud services such as GKE, VPC, Subnets, Load-balancers, Cloud storage, Big Query, IAM, Data Proc , DataFlow and Stack driver monitoring.
• Experience with one or more Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as Terraform (preferred) 
• Experience with Big data platforms such as Hadoop and Apache Spark.


Please share profiles at kundan@amaze-systems.com

job_description:
Hi,
Greetings from Thinklusive
We have a job opportunity for a hashtag#JavaDeveloper with one of our hashtag#client hashtag#onsite. Kindly let me know if you are interested or if someone who might be interested. Please send an updated resume to shashik@thinklusive.com.
 
Job Role :- Java Full Stack Developer
Job Location :- Reston, VA / Mc Lean, VA /NJ/NY
Job Description
10+ years of Programming experience with Java, J2EE, XML, and Web Services.
Must have AWS Services such as Mongo DB/ GraphQLEC2, S3, containerization, Lambda, SQS, SNS, step functions.
Experience with Angular 4/5/6/8 development, Java script, CSS, HTML
Strong AWS Experience including AWS CodeBuild, AWS CodeCommit, AWS CodePipeline , AWS Lambda, API Gateway, AWS CLI/Yaml/CloudFormation, Serverless Deployment
